journal-title-group.journal-title: Nebraska Journal of Economics and Business

publisher.publisher-name: College of Business Administration of the University of Nebraska

title-group.article-title: Stages of Development, Regional Characteristics, and the Demand for International Reserves

p.mixed-citation: H. R. Heller, "A New Measure of International Liquidity," National Banking Review, December, 1964, pp. 249-55;
H. R. Heller, "The Transactions Demand for International Means of Payments," Journal of Political Economy, vol. LXXVI, No. 1, Jan.-Feb., 1968, pp. 141-45;
E. J. Kane, "International Liquidity: A Probabilistic Approach," Kyklos, vol. XVIII, Feb. 1, 1965, pp. 27-47;
R. S. Thorn, "The Demand for International Reserves: A Note in Behalf of the Rejected Hypothesis," Review of Economics and Statistics, vol. XLIX, Nov., 1967, pp. 623-26 and "Reply" pp. 626-27.
A. Lindbeck, The New Theory of Credit Control in the United States (Stockholm: Almqvist and Wicksell, 1959)
